# Cycling Race Predictor - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A Next.js 14 application for predicting cycling race outcomes using AI, deployed on Vercel.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- **Authentication**: NextAuth.js
- **AI**: OpenAI API for predictions
- **Deployment**: Vercel

## Key Features
- Race prediction algorithm with weighted scoring
- Background AI agent for continuous data updates
- Public chat per race
- Premium: Custom race analysis
- Shareable prediction cards for social media

## Data Sources
- UCI Rankings
- Historical race results
- Instagram/social media intel
- User-submitted tips
